file.name: cyclic_reference.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Cyclic Reference Test
  description: >
    Demonstrate an Open API document using a JSON Schema that contains a type
    with a cyclic reference.
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
  version: 0.0.1
paths:
  /cyclic_reference:
    get:
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ElementOrCollection'
components:
  schemas:
    Common:
      type: object
      properties:
        tag:
          type: string
          enum: [ red, blue, green ]
    Element:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Common'
    Collection:
      allOf:
        - type: object
          properties:
            elements:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ElementOrCollection'
          required: [ elements ]
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Common'
    ElementOrCollection:
      oneOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Element'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Collection'

Error: parse: paths: /cyclic_reference: get: : responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/ElementOrCollection": parse schema: oneOf: [1]: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Collection": parse schema: allOf: [0]: parse schema: elements: parse schema: item: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/ElementOrCollection": infinite recursion: "#/components/schemas/ElementOrCollection"
